Thu, 30 Nov 2023 07:30:26 +0000 A Matamata man has died after a crash at Sanson two weeks ago.

Pregnancy poses far greater risk than oral contraceptives - University of Auckland expert https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/pregnancy-poses-far-greater-risk-than-oral-contraceptives-university-of-auckland-expert/UCU4CXRZENB43C3VLG3DD7NNVA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/pregnancy-poses-far-greater-risk-than-oral-contraceptives-university-of-auckland-expert/UCU4CXRZENB43C3VLG3DD7NNVA/ A coroner has warned women and doctors to take care over the combined oral contraceptive. Thu, 30 Nov 2023 05:37:20 +0000 Pregnant women were 30 times more likely to develop blood clots compared with taking the combined oral contraceptive, a women’s health specialist says. Photo / 123rf

He said it calmly.' Thu, 30 Nov 2023 05:32:53 +0000 Shargin Stephens was shot by police after he attacked an empty police car on July 14, 2016. He died 12 days later in hospital.
